name: Ultra Facial Advanced Repair Barrier Cream
about: What it is:An intensive barrier cream that relieves dry skin, helps support the moisture barrier, and visibly reduces redness caused by dryness..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Redness.Formulation:Rich Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Colloidal Oatmeal: Helps soothe and support skin..What Else You Need to Know:This barrier cream nourishes dry to very dry skin that can be caused by various types of external and internal aggressors. It visibly soothes, reduces redness, and supports skin.
ingredients: -Colloidal Oatmeal: Helps soothe and support skin..-Beta Glucan: Nourishes dry, sensitized skin for a smoother and healthier appearance...Aqua/Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Behenyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Trehalose, Sucrose Polystearate, C12-16 Alcohols, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer,Tromethamine, Tocopherol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate, Copolymer,Ceramide Np, Allantoin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Palmitic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin,Carbomer, Beta-Glucan, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Caprylyl Glycol, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cetyl Palmitate, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Colloidal Oatmeal, Sorbitan Olivate, Sorbitan Palmitate, C14-22 Alcohols, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply Kiehl's barrier cream after your facial serum using the appropriate amount for your skinu2019s needs. .-Gently massage in circular motions allowing the formula to smooth into skin..-For those with dry, sensitive skin, use day and night. .-Use in place of your moisturizers OR layer on top of Ultra Facial Cream (sold separately) for extra barrier repair. .-When applying, pay special attention to dry, compromised, and distressed areas; can also be used on sensitized skin, around dry lips, on windburn, around the eyes, on rough, dry skin, or on itchy, irritated skin
